signup_prompt: Hello there! I see you're not a member. Shall I get you signed-up this [time_of_day]?
Good [time_of_day], new comer. Shall we get you signed-up?
signup_denied: Well... I suppose that's the end of the road for us then. Perhaps you'll reconsider?
Our time together was far too brief 😕️ Perhaps I can convince you otherwise? 😉️
signup_still_denied: Aww too bad. Maybe next time 👋️
Sorry to see you go! Please come back again soon 🙂️
